services.title: Services

webDesign.title: Web design

seoAudit.desc: Technical audit, indexing issues, speed, content gaps, and a clear action plan.

onlineMarketing.title: Online marketing
onlineMarketing.desc: Messaging, funnels, landing improvements, and content that supports growth.

adsSetup.title: Ads setup
adsSetup.desc: Campaign structure, tracking, creatives, and initial optimization for results.

businessAutomation.desc: Reduce manual work with automations, workflows, and data sync between tools.

crmIntegrations.desc: Connect forms, CRM, messaging, analytics, and reporting into one workflow.

designSystem.title: Design system

printDesign.title: Print design

brandGuidelines.desc: Rules for typography, colors, logo usage, and consistent brand application.

1.a: Landing pages, websites, dashboards, mobile apps, design systems, marketing assets, and automations.

2.q: Do you work with existing projects?
2.a: Yes — we can redesign, improve performance, fix UX, and help with code.

3.a: Send a short description of your goal and timeline — we’ll reply with scope and next steps.

4.a: Yes — we can run iterative improvements, SEO, marketing, and automation as a monthly engagement.
